question:
[George] took his nephew [Leandro] to the football game. [Elizabeth]'s husband, [Chuck], went skiing with his son, [Mickey]. [Leandro] asked his brother [Mickey] if he would come help him fix his car next weekend. [Tommy] and [Carmelita] got married in Hawaii. [Tommy] went fishing with his daughter [Judy]. [Judy]'s sister, [Elizabeth], was n't invited because she hates fishing.
Question: How is [George] related to [Carmelita]?
